form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: To amend the Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2015, to reauthorize the Colorado River System conservation pilot program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Colorado River Basin System Conservation Extension Act.

section.header: Reauthorization of Colorado River System conservation pilot program
section.text: Section 206 of the Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2015 (43 U.S.C. 620 note; Public Law 113–235), is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (b)(2), by striking this Act and inserting the Colorado River Basin System Conservation Extension Act;
in subsection (c)(2), by striking 2024 and inserting 2026; and
in subsection (d), by striking 2025 and inserting 2027.
